DOC.brief_summary: This is a parallel-track, randomized study will observe whether intravenous ascorbic acid reduces the reported fatigue in women receiving adjuvant or neo-adjuvant chemotherapy for early stage breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Ascorbic Acid in Women Receiving Adjuvant or Neo-Adjuvant Chemotherapy for Early Stage Breast Cancer
